channel.title: Intigriti XSS challenge
channel.description:
Hey 0x00sec! Long time no see :wave:
I wanted to share with you this challenge made by [intigriti](http://www.intigriti.com). The challenge ends today, but hey! you still have a day :slight_smile:
The challenge can be found here: [challenge](https://challenge.intigriti.io/1) Original tweet from intigriti: [tweet](https://twitter.com/intigriti/status/1122837120161333250)
I learned a lot with it and had a good time trying to solve it. Hope you enjoy it :smile:
Edit: Forgot to say that the winner (randomly picked among submissions) gets a free 1 year Burp license plus exclusive swag package!
See you around, ~hasp0t
PS: I'm thinking of posting the solution here once the challenge ends. Let me know if you are interested!
